content: In the first quarter, we added 40 new LDDs to the network of clinical sites offering postoperative LAL treatments. As a result, our installed base rose to 246 units, up 134% versus the year-ago quarter and 19% versus the fourth quarter of 2021. In the first quarter, we added 40 new LDDs to the network of clinical sites offering postoperative LAL treatments. As a result, our installed base rose to 246 units, up 134% versus the year-ago quarter and 19% versus the fourth quarter of 2021.
